p: The prepared essential oil was added to an aqueous solution with 0.2% Tween 80 in a ratio of 1 : 7 ( m/ v). Subsequently, the mixtures were ultrasonicated for 30 min to obtain uniform essential oil emulsion. The compound pearl acne capsules were dissolved with distilled water in a ratio of 1 : 6 ( m/ v) to prepare an aqueous solution.
